Class Crab

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Player
        • Crab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundsListener

    public class Crab
extends Player
    A class that is specific to a Crab. A Crab is a type of Player.
    Author:
    Zelinsky
    See Also:
    Player

      Constructor and Description
      Crab(int x, int y, RequestQueue requestQueue)
      Constructs the Crab by calling Player's Constructor super(x, y, CRAB_WIDTH, CRAB_HEIGHT) and assigning the Crab its Sprite and RequestQueue.

      • update

        public void update(double gravity,
                   double drag)
        Updates the position of the Crab's Bounds based on gravity, drag, and the Crab's speed. Calls Entity's update(gravity, drag) and handles heldTrash movement..
        Overrides:
        update in class Entity
        Parameters:
        gravity - The gravity applied to the Entity
        drag - The drag applied to the Entity
        See Also:
        Entity
